I usually don't comment but, man, this song is ass. And yes, we all know the band essentially died since Adam left - this singer is not as good. However, they did write one good song - Painkiller - (though it would sound better if Adam sang it) - but the rest were terrible. In summation, this song doesn't suck because Adam isn't singing it - it sucks because it is horrible. Sounds like a B-side of some Imagine Dragons rap pop: KEEP CLIMBIN THA MOUNTAIN!!  fuckboy music.
